extendedInfo.description: It's a very simple, small, and easy to use phone locator. Easy Android Locator is for those who are worried about misplacing their phone, but don't need the huge list of features other locator apps have.Easy Android Locator features:  â¢ Ring phone even if on silent  â¢ Accurately and quickly locate phone with gps  â¢ Password Protect Settings  â¢ Allow List  â¢ Block List  â¢ Hide text messages that match a keyword  â¢ Hide application from app listIf you purchase Easy Android Locator Pro ($1.00), you also can:  â¢ Auto-enable GPS  â¢ Auto-enable Wi-fi (for more accurate location)  â¢ Unlimited numbers on Block and Allow lists (limited to 3 numbers on each otherwise)When locating, you get a text message back with the battery level, gps coordinates, direction of movement, speed of movement, a google maps link, and an approximate street addressDefault Keywords:  â¢ "Android gps" to locate phone  â¢ "Android ring" to make phone ring  â¢ "Android open" to unhide the application (if you hid it).After hiding, you may need to reboot the phone for it to disappear.If you need a phone locating app with more features, download Missing Droid (another app by jakar). It is free and has many other features for those of you who are really concerned about your phone's security.If you have any issues, email me at support@jakaar.net

reviews.title: Pretty impressive
reviews.comment: Returned my exact address when testing! Coolio!
